name: Naval Ops: Commander
description: Customize your command ship with over 200 weapons and defensive systems and take it across the seas in 80 challenging missions.  Purchase or use of this item is subject to the PlayStation®Network Terms of Service, this item’s use restrictions, and other applicable terms located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements. One-time license fee for downloads to up to 2 console systems that are associated with the purchasing account.This title has been converted from the original PlayStation®2 version to the PS3™ system. Consequently, there may be times where the title plays differently from the PlayStation®2 version, or where some features may not function properly.
